TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabControl extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector

summary.span: 表示包含多个项的控件，这些项共享屏幕上的同一空间。

span.span: Represents a control that contains multiple items that share the same space on the screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有助于最大程度地减少屏幕空间使用量，同时允许应用程序公开大量数据。The is useful for minimizing screen space usage while allowing an application to expose a large amount of data. 包含 共享同一屏幕空间的多个对象。A consists of multiple objects that share the same screen space. 一 次只能看到中的一个 。Only one in a is visible at a time. 当用户选择的选项卡时 ，将显示的内容， 并且隐藏其他对象的内容 。When a user selects the tab of a , the contents of that become visible and the contents of the other objects are hidden. 为 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的对象的集合 (例如字符串、图像或面板) 。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. ## 自定义 TabControl 控件Customizing the TabControl Control 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置 ，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 ，为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息 ，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态 ，请参阅 [TabControl 样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TabControl Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并将第 二个中的绑定 到 第一个中的 。The following example creates a and binds the in the second to a in the first . [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)]

summary.span: 获取一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果 对象的内容显示为字符串，应如何设置这些内容的格式。

span.span: Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the objects if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果 对象的内容显示为字符串，应如何设置这些内容的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the objects if they are displayed as strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义的复合字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅 [格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). 如果设置 了或，则将 忽略属性。If you set the or of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例将绑定 到对象的集合 `Student` 。The following example binds a to a collection of `Student` objects. `Student`类具有一个 `Name` 属性和一个对象的集合 `Course` ，并实现了 返回 `Name` 学生或列出学生课程的字符串的方法。The `Student` class has a `Name` property, a collection of `Course` objects, and implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. 该示例使用将 学生的名称放在 从) 继承的每个 (的中 ，并使用 来为的内容中的每个学生显示课程列表 。The example uses to put a student's name in the of each (which inherits from ), and the to display the course list for each student in the Content of the . [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#TabControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#tabcontrol)] 下面的示例实现 方法以返回 `Name` 学生的或列出学生课程的字符串。The following example implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#tabcontroltostring)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#tabcontroltostring)]

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource` 、或 `DynamicResource` 。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅 [XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 标识所请求的模板的键。The key that identifies the template being requested. 键引用中的现有资源 。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的，但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅 [内联样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个 对象。The following example creates two objects. 将 调用 `contentTemplate` 分配给的， 并将 调用的 `tabItemTemplate` 分配给 第二个的 。The called `contentTemplate` is assigned to the of the and the called `tabItemTemplate` is assigned to the of the second . 所有 对象均包含中定义的白色矩形 `contentTemplate` ，但第二个对象 具有灰矩形，如中所定义 `tabItemTemplate` 。All objects contain the white rectangle defined in `contentTemplate`, except the second , which has a gray rectangle, as defined in `tabItemTemplate`. [!code-xaml[TabControlContentTemplate_snip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplate_snip/CS/page1.xaml#1)] [!code-xaml[TabControlContentTemplate_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplate_snip/CS/page1.xaml#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ ContentTemplateSelector { System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为选择用于显示控件内容的模板提供自定义逻辑的 。

span.span: Gets or sets a that provides custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
A .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常， 当您对同一类型的对象具有多个时，您 需要提供自己的逻辑，以便 基于每个数据对象的属性来选择要应用的。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 请注意，如果您具有不同类型的对象，则可以在 上设置属性 。Note that if you have objects of different types, you can set the property on the . 如果这样做，则无需创建 。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果您的对象具有相同类型但具有不同的属性，则还可以考虑使用 或数据转换器。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview). 若要创建模板选择器，请创建一个继承自的类， 并重写 方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 定义类后，可以将类的实例分配给元素的模板选择器属性。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果同时 设置了和 属性，则忽略此属性。If both the and the properties are set, then this property is ignored. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource` 、或 `DynamicResource` 。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅 [XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 标识所请求的选择器实现的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该键引用实现实际重写的派生类 。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅 [WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). 还可以通过编程方式将类的实例 作为资源添加到资源字典。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary. *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 派生自和的类 。A class derived from and overrides . 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅 [WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性以不同的方式显示内容 ，具体取决于所选人员的家乡。The following example uses the property to display the content of a differently, depending on the hometown of the selected person. [!code-xaml[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-xaml[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-csharp[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/CSharp/Data.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/VisualBasic/Person.vb#1)] [!code-vb[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件 通过调用来引发事件 。The control raises the event by calling . 有关详细信息，请参阅[路由事件概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview)。For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview).

span.span: Provides data for .

summary.span: 为用户按任意键时引发的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user presses a key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现 通过将事件数据的属性设置为 "已处理" 将事件标记为已处理， `true` 用户按 ctrl + TAB、CTRL + SHIFT + TAB、HOME 或 END 在 对象之间导航。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when the user presses CTRL+TAB, CTRL+SHIFT+TAB, HOME, or END to navigate between objects. 否则，此实现不会更改 事件数据的属性) 的已处理状态 ( 。Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果重写 ，请始终在实现中调用基实现 。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 未能调用基实现会阻止基类使用类处理程序来处理事件，这可能会更改最终类的运行时行为。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以在特殊处理之前或之后调用基本实现，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当选项卡选择更改时，将更新此属性以引用活动的。This property is updated to reference the of the active when the tab selection changes. 使用 属性将 属性绑定到此属性。The of the uses the property to bind the property to this property. 如果为创建新 的 ，请确保 通过将 属性设置为 "SelectedContent" 或使用 [TemplateBinding 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension)将属性绑定到此属性。If you create a new for the , be sure to the bind the property to this property by setting the property to "SelectedContent" or by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性获取 `Person` 当前选定的中的 。The following example uses the property to get the `Person` in the currently selected . [!code-csharp[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)] 下面的示例为创建一个 。The following example creates a for the . 将 属性设置为 "SelectedContent" 可创建 、 和属性的别名 。Setting the property to "SelectedContent" creates aliases to the , , and properties. [!code-xaml[ControlTemplateExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlTemplateExamples/CS/resources/tabcontrol.xaml#13)] 下面的示例 通过使用 [TemplateBinding 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension)将属性绑定到属性。The following example binds the property to the property by using the [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当选项卡选择更改时，将更新此属性，以便对活动的进行引用。The updates this property to reference to the for the active when the tab selection changes. 设置 或的 属性 ，以指定的 。Set or the property on a to specify the for a . 使用 属性将 属性绑定到此属性。The of the uses the property to bind the property to this property. 如果为创建新 的 ，请确保 通过将 属性设置为 "SelectedContent" 或使用 [TemplateBinding 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension)将属性绑定到此属性。If you create a new for the , be sure to the bind the property to this property by setting the property to "SelectedContent" or by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例为创建一个 。The following example creates a for the . 将 属性设置为可以 `"SelectedContent"` 创建 、 和属性的别名 。Setting the property to `"SelectedContent"` creates aliases to the , , and properties.
